Issue.creator: jimthematrix
Issue.summary: Make client for new COP service a separate npm package
Issue.description: The idea came out of the discussions among the SDK workgroup. main goal is to align the SDK design with the fact that MSP is an optional part of fabric. if a network uses external CA instead of an MSP implementation, then the client application will only need to require() the "hfc" package, in which case ecerts provisioning is the application's responsibility. if the application wants to use COP, then add require() for "hfc-cop" to enroll users and provision ecerts.
